backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two frontend tasks related to adding complete service images and premium assets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry with SEO metadata, OG/Twitter tags, and script bootstrap for the React app.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify redirect rule routing all paths to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Router setup using TanStack Router with five routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component displaying the salon logo image with styled text.
frontend/src/components/ContactActions.t: Contact action list rendering phone and WhatsApp buttons from business details.
frontend/src/components/CtaButtons.tsx: CTA button group for booking via WhatsApp or calling directly.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Fixed floating WhatsApp action button linking to the first WhatsApp number.
frontend/src/components/GalleryGrid.tsx: Responsive grid that renders gallery images with hover zoom animation.
frontend/src/components/MobileStickyCall: Mobile-only fixed call bar at screen bottom using the primary phone number.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Layout wrapper component applying consistent vertical spacing and container width.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Runtime SEO utility that updates document title, description, and canonical link.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Service card showing optional image, details, price, and a WhatsApp booking button.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and Instagram/social attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop nav links, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and utility components.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Exports an array of gallery image metadata for the salon.
frontend/src/data/services.ts: Defines service categories and detailed service listings with prices and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout functions, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom theme variables and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/businessDetails.ts: Static business info including name, address, phone numbers, and social links.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Utility functions to generate tel and WhatsApp links from phone numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page showing the salonâ€™s story, values, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with hero text, location details, social link, contact actions, and an embedded Google Map.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery page with a hero section and a grid of images via GalleryGrid.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero banner, feature cards, and CTA sections promoting grooming services.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Generates the services page by rendering hero text and mapping service categories into ServiceCard grids.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, architecture notes, image needs, and existing feature records.
